name: .children
description: Get all children, or get or check for children that match the provided selector or element(s)

arguments.name: comparison
arguments.description: The selector or element(s) to compare children to. If it's an array-like or zQuery object, only one element in the object must match for it to count as a match.

arguments.name: selectorWithExclamation
arguments.description: A string that contains a selector and the exclamation mark (!) as its first character. This checks if all children of all elements in the current instance match the selector.

arguments.name: selectorWithAsterisk
arguments.description: A string that contains a selector and the exclamation mark (*) as its first character. This checks if at least one child of all elements in the current instance matches the selector.

arguments.name: selectorWithQuestion
arguments.description: A string that contains a selector and the question mark (?) as its first character. This checks if at least one child of one element in the current instance matches the selector.

returns: A new zQuery instance containing the matching descendants
A boolean that is `true` if all/some children match of all/some elements and `false` otherwise
